Question: Owl Technologies Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Owl Technologies Inc.

Product: Owl AI New 3D Thermal ADAS for Night Pedestrian Automatic Braking

- 3D Thermal Imaging for Night Vision for Pedestrian Automatic Emergency Braking (PAEB)
- LWIR thermal imaging combined with computer vision for classification and ranging
- HD thermal camera technology with AI software for identifying warm objects in total darkness, up to 200 yards ahead
- Owl Autonomous Imaging delivers monocular 3D thermal ranging computer vision solutions for automotive and industrial mobility markets
- Partners with Nvidia at CES 2024 to showcase OWL AI neural networks running on a Jetson ORIN processor
- Software suite performs object classification, segmentation, fusion, and offers the ability to determine distance using unique CNNs
- Demonstrations of the solution running live at CES 2024 booth (West Hall – 6867)
Summary_cn:
Owl Technologies Inc.

产品：Owl AI新款3D热成像自动驾驶系统，用于夜间行人紧急制动

- 使用3D热成像进行夜间行人紧急制动（PAEB）
- 结合LWIR热成像和计算机视觉进行分类和距离测量
- 采用AI软件的高清热摄像头技术，能够在完全黑暗中识别200码内的热物体
- Owl自主成像为汽车和工业移动市场提供单目3D热成像计算机视觉解决方案
- 在CES 2024上与Nvidia合作，展示运行在Jetson ORIN处理器上的OWL AI神经网络
- 软件套件可进行对象分类、分割、融合，并具有使用独特卷积神经网络进行距离测定的能力
- 在CES 2024展位（西大厅-6867）进行直播演示
